citation.title: Atomistic modeling of the Ti–Al binary system
citation.abstract: An interatomic potential for the Ti–Al binary system has been developed based on the second nearest-neighbor modified embedded-atom method (2NN MEAM) formalism. This potential describes fundamental materials properties (structural, thermodynamic, elastic, defect, deformation and thermal properties) of Ti–Al alloys in good agreements with experimental or first-principles data. The transferability and applicability of the present potential to atomic-scale investigations for Ni-based superalloys or Ti–Al based alloys are demonstrated.
